title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, New York and Hryhorivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, New York and Hryhorivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Holmivskyy and Druzhba of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
